alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 1:04PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of western Guam, from Agat to Naval Base Guam to Piti. * WHEN...Until 230 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along with rises in small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 102 PM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain that will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tamuning, Asan, Piti and Santa Rita, and Naval Base Guam. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
